About.title: Our Story
About.subtitle: Handmade for your collar.
About.p1: nots of Ties began with a simple idea: mass-produced accessories lack soul. In a world of fast fashion, we wanted to slow down.
About.p2: Every tie is handmade in our small studio in Brits, South Africa. We source fabrics that would last a long time - designs that breathe, cottons that soften with age.
About.promiseText: If a stitch ever comes loose, send it back. We build products to last a lifetime.
